summary: Completed comprehensive testing of admin moderation dashboard. All backend admin APIs (8/8) working perfectly. Frontend admin dashboard fully functional with proper authentication, authorization, submission filtering, moderation modal, and user management. Admin links correctly appear/hidden based on user role.
passed_tests: Admin stats endpoint returns correct statistics (1 user, 501 submissions)
Admin submissions endpoint returns paginated submissions (50 per page)
Status filtering works correctly (pending: 1, validated: 500, flagged: 0)
Admin users endpoint returns user list with pagination
Unauthorized requests properly rejected with 401 status
Admin dashboard loads successfully for admin users
Non-admin users correctly redirected to login page
Admin link appears in navbar for admin users only
Admin menu item appears in user dropdown for admin users
Submissions can be filtered by status (all, pending, validated, flagged)
Moderation modal displays submission details correctly
All moderation controls present (validate, flag, set pending, notes)
Evidence viewing button available when evidence attached
Users tab displays user list with admin status indicators
Stats cards show correct counts and styling
Tab navigation works between Submissions and Users
No error messages found on any admin pages
